mainSection.heading: Help out your favorite open source projects and become a better developer while doing it.
mainSection.description: Pick your favorite repos to receive a different open issue in your inbox every day. Fix the issue and everybody wins. 51,916 developers are working on 5,166 open source repos using CodeTriage.

projects.heading: React native chat app boilerplate
projects.mainDesc: This chat app is a boilerplate for any react native developer who wants to build a chat app.
projects.secondDesc: The goal of this boilerplate is to provide a fully functional chat app which can be reused with very little to no modification.

contribution.desc: If you want to contribute to our project and make it better, visit our github link.

projects.heading: React native base app seed
projects.mainDesc: This base app is a boilerplate for any react native developer who wants to build a simple app.
projects.secondDesc: The goal of this boilerplate is to provide a simple functional routing & theme app which can be reused with very little to no modification.

contribution.desc: If you want to contribute to our project and make it better, visit our github link.

teams.title: Yogesh Kapoor
teams.bio: I am a Software Developer at Recraft Relic. I write about JavaScript and React. And sharing my worldview with everyone join my quest by following me at Medium.

teams.title: Manoj Singh
teams.bio: Thinker & Javascript developer from Chandigarh. I love JavaScript and mostly spend my day programming in JavaScript, ReactJs Nodejs solving problems.

teams.title: Puran Chand
teams.bio: I am Frontend Developer, designer and definitely a tech enthusiast, This website is about my life, my work and my hobbies I hope you will find something interesting here!
